prompt: Try again and update the research docs and websearch : Perform a comprehensive review analysis of the existing #codebase along with documentations. Perform a comprehensive analysis of the buisness logic of this Next.js e-commerce multi-tenant SaaS platform. The main obejective was to build a Saas application for the buisness owners to launch their own StoreFront. Owners can manage their inventory, products, orders, customers, marketing, analysis, sales, accounts, team/staff role permission assisgn and all the other services that requires to run a fully operational day to day buisness operation services. Perform a online reasearch #agents based on the existing saas platform's implementations and modeuls api. Suggest improvements, identify issues, refine the buisness logic, new features and all the other informations you may find, also check the exisiting database schema and the api suggest refactoring and the UI pages. Use macp tools as you needed. Also I'm using Next.js 16 and shadcn ui, sqlite/postgress and vercel. Use the #next-devtools (I have started the dev server in a seperate terminal so no need to start it again), #shadcn for letest docs for best coding practice and implementations. Perform the task using #sequentialthinking and for task list use #todo . Save all of your findings with comprehensive breakdown along with example code implementations, use cases, user stories, database schema design and diagram along with implementations plan in the 'docs\research' directories in .md file format.

logs.name: modelList
